name: MacGourmet Recipe File
summary: Learn about .MGO files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Users can double-click MGO files to import the recipe into the currently-opened cookbook.
NOTE: MacGourmet cookbooks are stored in .MGDATABASE files.

description: Recipe file created by MacGourmet, a program used to organize personal cookbook recipes; stores recipe information in an XML format, such as ingredients, cooking instructions, and an image of the finished recipe; used for exporting individual recipes from a cookbook and sharing with others.
